pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.MessageController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/message-module")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class MessageController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "message-box-inbox"
    • "message-box-sent"
    • "message"
    • "create-new-message"


    This controller also perform the actions on the messages.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      Constructs a MessageController with the MessageService, UserService, Environment, AccessLevelControl and SearchEngineUtils.

      Returns the view of "message" with model attributes:

      String showMessageBoxInbox(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, String systemMessage, Integer messageInboxStartResult)
      Returns the view of "message-box-inbox" with model attributes:
      messageInboxStartResult - The value of first index of the results amountOfResults - The number of total results showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink" resultRange - The description of pagination showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink" systemMessage - The one of the system messages userMessagesList - The list of Message objects
      String showMessageBoxSent(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model theModel, String systemMessage, Integer messageSentStartResult)

      Returns the view of "create-new-message" with model attributes:
      message - The Message object

      • showMessageBoxInbox

        @RequestMapping(value="/message-box-inbox")
public String showMessageBoxInbox(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                               org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                               @RequestParam(required=false,name="systemMessage")
                                                                               String systemMessage,
                                                                               @RequestParam(required=false,name="messageInboxStartResult")
                                                                               Integer messageInboxStartResult)
        Returns the view of "message-box-inbox" with model attributes:
        • messageInboxStartResult - The value of first index of the results
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of "showLessLink"
        • systemMessage - The one of the system messages
        • userMessagesList - The list of Message objects
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        systemMessage - The String containing the system message
        messageInboxStartResult - The Integer containing the first index of the results
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

      • sendMessage

        @PostMapping(value="/send-message")
public String sendMessage(@RequestParam(value="recipient")
                                                               String email,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="subject")
                                                               String subject,
                                                               Locale locale,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="textArea")
                                                               String text,
                                                               org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Send the message and redirects to the view of "message-box-inbox" with redirect attributes:
        • systemMessage- The one of the system messages
        Parameters:
        email - The String containing the email of the recipient
        subject - The String containing the subject of the message
        locale - The Locale containing the user's locale
        text - The String containing the text of the message
        redirectAttributes - The RedirectAttributes containing the system messages
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view
